overview:
Joe, also known as The Machine, leads all development efforts at CollectiveX. Often utilized as a one-man team, Joe’s non-stop coding marathons are legendary within the Company.

Joe’s tireless programming efforts, coupled with his ability to “think in code” while visualizing complex interconnected systems, is what separates him from his peers. His knack for single-handedly managing massive code bases, hardware configurations and 3rd-party components, guides his leadership as CollectiveX’s Chief Technical Geek.

In his personal time, Joe enjoys playing the piano and the guitar, using Linux, playing with his kids, and NHL hockey â€” Let’s Go Caps!
